DOC.brief_summary: Chlorella , type unicellular fresh water algae , popular foodstuff Asia , especially Taiwan . Recent study show hypoglycemic effect Chlorella increase glucose uptake liver muscle , lower serum free fatty acid level , activation PPAR gamma receptor . However , hypoglycemic effect diabetic patient study . In order clarify hypoglycemic effect mechanism Chlorella diabetic patient , investigator conduct 12-week randomized , double-blind , placebo-control trial diabetic patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Chlorella Glycemic Control Diabetes
